detectors.description: Lotto.calculateWinner(uint256,uint256) (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_087.sol#39-62) uses a weak PRNG: "winningTicketIndex = decisionBlockHash % rounds[roundIndex].ticketsCount (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_087.sol#49)"
Lotto.fallback() (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_087.sol#122-150) ignores return value by msg.sender.send(msg.value - value) (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_087.sol#131)
Lotto.cash(uint256,uint256) (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_087.sol#81-104) ignores return value by winner.send(subpot) (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_087.sol#100)

Deprecated standard detected uint256(block.blockhash(blockIndex)) (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_087.sol#107):
	- Usage of "block.blockhash()" should be replaced with "blockhash()"

detectors.description: solc-0.4.0 is an outdated solc version. Use a more recent version (at least 0.8.0), if possible.

detectors.description:
Version constraint ^0.4.0 contains known severe issues (https://solidity.readthedocs.io/en/latest/bugs.html)
	- DirtyBytesArrayToStorage
	- KeccakCaching
	- EmptyByteArrayCopy
	- DynamicArrayCleanup
	- TupleAssignmentMultiStackSlotComponents
	- MemoryArrayCreationOverflow
	- privateCanBeOverridden
	- IncorrectEventSignatureInLibraries_0.4.x
	- ExpExponentCleanup
	- NestedArrayFunctionCallDecoder
	- ZeroFunctionSelector
	- DelegateCallReturnValue
	- ECRecoverMalformedInput
	- SkipEmptyStringLiteral
	- ConstantOptimizerSubtraction
	- IdentityPrecompileReturnIgnored
	- HighOrderByteCleanStorage
	- OptimizerStaleKnowledgeAboutSHA3
	- LibrariesNotCallableFromPayableFunctions.
It is used by:
	- ^0.4.0 (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_087.sol#1)

detectors.description:
Reentrancy in Lotto.fallback() (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_087.sol#122-150):
	External calls:
	- msg.sender.send(msg.value - value) (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_087.sol#131)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- rounds[roundIndex].ticketsCount += ticketsCount (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_087.sol#136)
	- buyersLength = rounds[roundIndex].buyers.length ++ (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_087.sol#139)
	- rounds[roundIndex].buyers[buyersLength] = msg.sender (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_087.sol#140)
	- rounds[roundIndex].ticketsCountByBuyer[msg.sender] += ticketsCount (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_087.sol#143)
	- rounds[roundIndex].ticketsCount += ticketsCount (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_087.sol#144)
	- rounds[roundIndex].pot += value (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_087.sol#147)
